mutants.code:
def get_postorder_traversal(inorder, preorder, n):

    def solve(inorder, preorder, ans):
        if len(inorder) != 0:
            return
        if len(inorder) == 1:
            ans.append(inorder[0])
            return
        n = preorder[0]
        nidx = inorder.index(n)
        (l_in, r_in) = (inorder[:nidx], inorder[nidx + 1:])
        (l_p, r_p) = (preorder[1:nidx + 1], preorder[nidx + 1:])
        solve(l_in, l_p, ans)
        solve(r_in, r_p, ans)
        ans.append(n)
    ans = []
    solve(inorder, preorder, ans)
    return ans

        ans.append(n)
    ans = []
    solve(inorder, preorder, ans)
    return ans

def get_postorder_traversal(inorder, preorder, n):

    def solve(inorder, preorder, ans):
        if len(inorder) == 0:
            return
        if len(inorder) == 1:
            ans.append(inorder[0])
            return
        n = preorder[0]
        nidx = inorder.index(n)
        (l_in, r_in) = (inorder[:nidx], inorder[nidx + 1:])
        (l_p, r_p) = (preorder[1:nidx + 1], preorder[nidx + -1:])
        solve(l_in, l_p, ans)
        solve(r_in, r_p, ans)
        ans.append(n)
    ans = []
    solve(inorder, preorder, ans)
    return ans
